comment:
Grease units:The amount of lubricant required for the slicers to operate smoothly, measured in units per minute.
Slices per minute:The rate at which the slicers can cut meat into slices, measured in slices per minute.
Total number of slicers:The combined number of manual and automatic slicers needed to meet the slicing requirements of the butcher shop while minimizing the total number of slicers.
